text: crazy question and I dont know if this is the right channel, but is there a way to use HubDB to generate Graphql data that could be sent to an external source. Essentially, creating a Headless CMS to push updates to our gatsby site. I know this is a strange use-case, but it seems like it should be possible?
HubDB does have a REST API you could use, but no GraphQL middleware as far as I know. There is <https://www.gatsbyjs.com/plugins/gatsby-source-HubSpot/> for blog posts though.
